sentences.en: Abrasives, Adhesives , Tapes Wipers , Washroom Products , 3 M Authorized Distributor , Kimberly - Clark Distributor.
sentences.cn: 工业擦纸 、 研磨材料 、 胶粘剂 、 胶粘带等.3M授权分销商.

sentences.en: Clerk : The elevators are over there next to the washroom.
sentences.cn: 电梯在那边,在洗手间旁边.

sentences.en: Excuse me , could you tell me how to use washroom? Thank you!
sentences.cn: 请问如何使用飞机上的洗手间? 谢谢.
对不起, 请问厕所在哪儿?

sentences.en: HAN MEI: The washroom? Oh, it - s over there. Let - s go.
sentences.cn: 韩梅: 洗手间? 哦, 在那边, 我们同时去吧.

sentences.en: I hung around until Helen had to go to the washroom.
sentences.cn: 我在外边一直等到海伦不得不上厕所.

sentences.en: It is leaking, so the washroom floor is full of water now.
sentences.cn: 管子漏水, 所以盥洗室的地上满都是水.

sentences.en: It really puts me off a place when the washroom is dirty.
sentences.cn: 厕所很脏,令我对那个地方很反感.

sentences.en: J: Lovely Paris kinglet ( prince ), may I go to the washroom?
sentences.cn: 朱丽叶: 可爱的 帕里斯 小王子, 请问你是否愿意让我去个厕所?

sentences.en: Oh, can you show me the way to the washroom?
sentences.cn: 哦, 你能告诉我哪里是卫生间 吗 ?

sentences.en: Paulo: My books Oh, I left them in washroom.
sentences.cn: 保罗: 我的书糟糕, 我忘在洗手间里了.

sentences.en: The landlord pays cleaners who come daily, and there is a dingy shared washroom where residents can clean their belongings.
sentences.cn: 房东雇了清洁工每天来打扫，还有一个昏暗的公用盥洗室，供住户们洗自己的东西。

sentences.en: The washroom is just ahead and to the right.
sentences.cn: 洗手间就在前面,右手边.

sentences.en: There is a washroom at the end of the corridor.
To have a private washroom was luxurious.
sentences.cn: 有私人盥洗室是再惬意不过的.

sentences.en: Were is the washroom? Please go straight ahead then turn left.
sentences.cn: 请问盥洗室在哪? 请一直往前走,然后往左转.

trans.tran_en: a room in a public building where you can wash and use the toilet
